verses.text: I \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, because he hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \add and\add* my \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*.

Because he hath \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* his \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* unto me, therefore will I \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon \add him\add* as long as I \w live|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 116.2 \ft as long…: Heb. in my days\f*

The \w sorrows|strong="H2256"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w compassed|strong="H0661"\w* me, and the \w pains|strong="H4712"\w* of \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* gat \w hold|strong="H4672"\w* upon me: I \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w* and \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w*.\f + \fr 116.3 \ft gat…: Heb. found me\f*

Then \w called|strong="H7121"\w* I upon the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, I \w beseech|strong="H0577"\w* thee, \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
\w Gracious|strong="H2587"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; yea, our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w merciful|strong="H7355"\w*.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w preserveth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*: I was brought \w low|strong="H1809"\w*, and he \w helped|strong="H3467"\w* me.
\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* unto thy \w rest|strong="H4494"\w*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath dealt \w bountifully|strong="H1580"\w* with thee.

For thou hast \w delivered|strong="H2502"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* from \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*, \add and\add* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* from \w falling|strong="H1762"\w*.
I will \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.
I \w believed|strong="H0539"\w*, therefore have I \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*: I was \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w*:
I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in my \w haste|strong="H2648"\w*, All \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \add are\add* \w liars|strong="H3576"\w*.
What shall I \w render|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add for\add* all his \w benefits|strong="H8408"\w* toward me?

I will \w take|strong="H5375"\w* the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, and \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
I will \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* my \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* now in the presence of all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
\w Precious|strong="H3368"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of his \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w truly|strong="H0577"\w* I \add am\add* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*; I \add am\add* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \add and\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*: thou hast \w loosed|strong="H6605"\w* my \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w*.

I will \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* to thee the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*, and will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
I will \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* my \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* now in the presence of all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,

In the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*.
